hello!

I'm Treawna, an artist, designer (musician, nutritionist) and photographer based in Ottawa, Canada. I specialize in obsessing over the fine details while calmly translating information into pleasing visual experiences!

I have always felt best when learning and creating, and design has provided endless opportunity to do both. I love that each mind processes information so differently, and I’m grateful to collaborate with others through a process of empathy, understanding and creating.

Other activities include spending time in nature, cold showers, collecting books at an inversely proportional rate to reading them, thanking loved ones profusely for feeding me while I code this website. Additionally, listening to a playlist titled Seth Cohen Starter Pack while coding this website.

thank you for stopping by!
